sentences.sContent: In order to celebrate the one hundredth birthday of our school, every class will hold a party.
sentences.sContent_eng: In order to celebrate the one hundredth birthday of our school, every class will hold a party.
sentences.sCn: 为了庆祝我校第一百周岁生日，各班都将举行一个庆祝会。

sentences.sContent: The system can print electronic features smaller than a hundredth of a millimetre wide from a variety of materials.
sentences.sContent_eng: The system can print electronic features smaller than a hundredth of a millimetre wide from a variety of materials.
sentences.sCn: 这个系统能在许多种类的材料上印刷比一毫米的一百分之一还要小的东西。

synos.tran: 第一百，第一百个；百分之一

trans.tranCn: 第一百个； 百分之一
